definition: Hongyuan county (Tibetan: rka khog rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
Hongyuan county (Tibetan: rka khog rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
(bird species of China) red junglefowl (Gallus gallus)

sentences.english: Hongyuan:Hongyuan is the only complete grassland farming county in A Ba which is Tibet's habitation.
sentences.chinese: 紅原紅原是阿壩州唯一的以藏族聚居爲主的純牧業縣。

sentences.chinese: 紅原紅原是阿壩州唯一的以藏族聚居爲主的純牧業縣。

sentences.english: Offspring or descendants considered as a group.
sentences.chinese: 家禽鳥類，紅原雞的後代。

sentences.english: Hongyuan is located in the east border of Qingzang plateau which is called"global ridge".
sentences.chinese: 紅原地處“世界屋脊”青藏高原東部邊緣。
